item.description:
Another round of Tennis Lessons at the Hingham Country Club!!  The cost is pay as you go - $20 for an hour.  If you attend 4 classes, you can get the 4th lesson free.  That means you get 4 lessons for $60 which is a great deal!

Here is the website to check out: http://www.southshorecc.com/

IF YOU HAVE NOT ALREADY ANSWERED THE REQUIRED QUESTIONS, PLEASE DO SO AFTER YOU RSVP TO THIS MEETUP.

The club has their own rackets, and the instructor will determine what your skill level is within the first 10 minutes. He will match us up appropriately depending on your skill levels.


*When: Tuesdays @ 6:15-7:15 (depending how long you want to go)

*Where: South Shore Country Club, Hingham, right near Hingham Commuter Line

*Why: Tennis is a fun and great form of exercise!

*Event Organizer(s): Chandra

*Cost: $20 for first hour, $10 for next 1/2 hour.  CASH ONLY.

*Min/Max: Minimum of 5 Yes RSVPs.  Maximum: 12

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions are posted on the "Directions to Frequently Used Venues" Discussion Thread on the Message Board.
item.how_to_find_us: Park next to tennis courts and find us on the tennis courts outside

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Tuesday Night Tennis Lessons!
